name: Hagia Sophia
description: Former church, mosque, and now museum—icon of Byzantine and Ottoman eras

name: Sultanahmet (Blue) Mosque
description: Stunning 17th-century mosque famed for its blue İznik tiles

name: Topkapı Palace
description: Ottoman sultans’ residence with treasury, harem, and gardens

name: Basilica Cistern
description: Underground Byzantine water reservoir with Medusa columns

name: Grand Bazaar
description: Labyrinthine covered market of 4,000+ shops selling carpets, spices, jewelry

name: Spice Bazaar
description: Historic market of aromas: saffron, lokum, nuts, teas, and more

name: Galata Tower
description: Medieval stone tower with panoramic city and Bosphorus vistas

name: İstiklal Avenue
description: Bustling pedestrian street of boutiques, cafés, and street performers

name: Taksim Square
description: Modern heart of Istanbul with monuments and transit hub

name: Dolmabahçe Palace
description: Lavish 19th-century palace on the Bosphorus shore

name: Süleymaniye Mosque
description: Grandeur of Ottoman architecture perched on a hill

name: Rüstem Pasha Mosque & Bazaar
description: Small mosque famous for its intricate İznik tilework, next to a spice market

name: Chora Church (Kariye Museum)
description: Byzantine church adorned with exquisite mosaics and frescoes

name: Maiden’s Tower
description: Romantic islet tower in the Bosphorus—legends and café upstairs

name: Bosphorus Boat Cruise
description: Scenic ferry ride between Europe and Asia past palaces and villages

name: Princes’ Islands
description: Car-free archipelago with Victorian cottages and bike/carriage tours

name: Ortaköy District
description: Bohemian area by the Bosphorus known for kumpir and nightlife

name: Çamlıca Hill
description: Highest viewpoint in Istanbul offering 360° panoramas

name: Haydarpaşa Railway Station
description: Historic train terminus with passenger ferry dock views

name: Beylerbeyi Palace
description: Ottoman summer residence on the Asian side by the water

name: Fener & Balat Districts
description: Historic Greek and Jewish quarters of colorful houses and churches

name: Süleymaniye Hammam
description: Traditional Turkish bath near the mosque

name: Çemberlitaş Hammam
description: 18th-century public bathhouse with authentic steam rituals

name: Istanbul Modern
description: Contemporary art museum on the waterfront with rotating exhibitions

name: Pierre Loti Café & Hill
description: Literary café reached by cable car with Golden Horn outlook

name: Rahmi M. Koç Museum
description: Industrial heritage and transport museum in a former shipyard

name: Istanbul Aquarium
description: Thematic aquarium with global marine habitats in Florya

name: Miniatürk Park
description: Open-air park of Turkey’s landmarks in miniature

name: Golden Horn Kayak Tour
description: Paddle through historic inlet and under bridges

name: Istanbul Electric Bike Tour
description: Cycle between seafront promenades, palaces, and parks

name: Istanbul Street Food Tour
description: Taste simit, balik ekmek, midye dolma, and more at local stalls

name: Turkish Cooking Class
description: Learn to prepare meze, kebabs, baklava in a home kitchen

name: Rumeli Fortress
description: 14th-century fortress guarding the Bosphorus north of the city

name: Tünel Funicular & Nostalgic Tram
description: Historic underground lift and heritage tram on Istiklal Avenue

name: Safranbolu Day Trip
description: Ottoman architecture UNESCO town visited by bus

name: Istinye Park Mall
description: High-end indoor-outdoor shopping with Bosphorus views

name: Kadıköy Fish Market
description: Asian side bazaar of fresh seafood, produce, and eateries

name: Bağdat Avenue
description: Trendy seaside shopping boulevard on the Asian shore

name: Great Palace Mosaic Museum
description: Rare Byzantine floor mosaics in Sultanahmet’s excavations

name: Whirling Dervish Show
description: Spiritual Sema ceremony in a 15th-century caravanserai

name: Istanbul Ghost Walk
description: Nighttime legends through Sultanahmet’s alleys

name: Atatürk Arboretum
description: Botanical gardens and woodland walks on the European side

name: Gülhane Park
description: Historic imperial garden next to Topkapı Palace

name: Şehir Hatları Ferry
description: Public Bosphorus ferries linking Europe and Asia

name: Sunset Bosphorus Dinner Cruise
description: Evening on deck with dinner, music, and city lights

name: Kadıköy Street Art Tour
description: Murals and installations in the vibrant Asian quarter
